p:
DNA, RNA, and protein extraction was carried out using Qiagen AllPrep DNA/RNA/Protein Mini Kit following the manufacturer’s instructions for cohorts 1, 2 and 4, with small variations for cohort 3 as previously described
35 and recapitulated in the Supplementary Methods. Samples were frozen at −80 °C (cohorts 1, 2, 4) or −70 °C (cohort 3) prior to assays.
